thread.title: LSU is No. 2 in 5-star Alabama linebacker Lyndell Wilson's top 8
thread.title_full: LSU is No. 2 in 5-star Alabama linebacker Lyndell Wilson's top 8 | NOLA.com

author: Amos Morale III, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: LSU is No. 2 in 5-star Alabama linebacker Lyndell Wilson's top 8
text:
Five-star Alabama linebacker Lyndell Wilson said LSU is one of the programs recruiting him the hardest and it looks like that effort is paying off.
The Tigers came in at No. 2 on Wilson's top 8. Wilson released the list late Wednesday.
Florida is his top school, followed by LSU and Ole Miss. Alabama came in fourth.
Wilson recently said that he might try to take visits with another five-star Alabama linebacker in Ben Davis. Davis has said that LSU is one of the programs in his top group as well.
View the full list below.

Wilson also tweeted Wednesday night that he would be committing on National Signing Day.
